title: I think its time to quit, I'm really tired with this stupid beta client lagg.

replies.body: Sorry to hear you've lost a game due to this lag, and I highly recommend sticking to custom games for now until resolve.  Your PC might be solid, but your connection specifically to the game server sounds like it's really struggling here.  Use our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help improve your connection to us and your route there.  I hope that helps!
